RelatedSentence: Post Luxembourg has launched CCP Mobile , a free app for iOS and Android smartphones and tablets that gives P&T bank customers access to their CCP internet accounts when on the go .
The app allows customers to check their bank balance , carry out bank transfers , browse recent transactions and top up the ' Easy ' prepaid VISA card from Post Finance .
